      • Serialized Fields

        • personId

          Properties of an Invitation object: -the personID of the user requested to be added as participant -the Party in which the add should happen -the status of the invitation: "pending", "accepted", "declined"

    • Class domain.Party extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • partyID

          int partyID
          Properties of a Party object; Include: -a unique id; -a title; -a location (String representation) -a description -a date (String representation) -a time (String representation) - a boolean property that defines if a user can join the party freely or it requires the Host permission -a string containing the path to an online Spotify playlist - a Person object that represents the host of the party (has full authority over the object)

        • partyTitle

          java.lang.String partyTitle

        • location

          java.lang.String location

        • description

          java.lang.String description

        • date

          java.lang.String date

        • time

          java.lang.String time

        • isPrivate

          boolean isPrivate

        • playlistURL

          java.lang.String playlistURL

        • host

          Person host

        • items

          java.util.List<E> items
          Properties of the Party object; Describe the list of items necessary for the party along with it's participants

        • people

          java.util.List<E> people

    • Class domain.Person extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • personID

          int personID
          Properties of a Person object; Includes: - an id generated by the persistence upon inserting - a name (of the user) - an email adress - a password - a boolean variable specifying if the Person is a host or not (used for small functionality of the system) - an username

          java.lang.String name
